title: KKR Asia Credit Fund Draws 75% New Investors as Decoupling Rises
description: KKR & Co. raised three-quarters of its $2.5 billion Asia private credit fund from new investors, as deepening economic decoupling pushes firms to broaden exposure and hedge geopolitical risk, according to top executives.
content: KKR & Co. raised three-quarters of its $2.5 billion Asia private credit fund from new investors, as deepening economic decoupling pushes firms to broaden exposure and hedge geopolitical risk, according to top executives.
